document_data.name: Elversult Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Elversult Hall''' was a stately public meeting place in the city of [[Elversult]].
document_data.Location: It was situated on the northern side city's open air marketplace, facing [[Temple Hill]] to the south.
document_data.Structure: The hall featured [[marble]] columns that supported a tall, arched entrance.
document_data.Activities: Elversian used the hall as a venue to conduct business or hire on new workers.
